author: Eric Edholm - Shutdown Corner
title: NFL: Fan wins date with Genie Bouchard after Patriots comeback - Yahoo7
text:
Fan wins date with Genie Bouchard after Patriots comeback Eric Edholm - Shutdown Corner - Yahoo US on February 7, 2017, 8:02 am Share NFL: Fan wins date with Genie Bouchard after Patriots comeback - Yahoo7 There were a lot of winners and losers from the incredible theater that was Super Bowl LI. And you can throw some random dude on Twitter as one of the biggest winners. Close Super Bowl 51: One of the greatest shows in history UP NEXT VIDEO Super Bowl 51: One of the greatest shows in history. Source: Seven News Super Bowl 51: One of the greatest shows in history 
With the New England Patriots trailing the Atlanta Falcons, 28-3, a fan sent Canadian tennis pro Eugenie Bouchard a simple request. @geniebouchard if patriots win we go on a date? ‚Äî TW1 (@punslayintwoods) February 6, 2017 Genie Bouchard owes a random fan on Twitter a date. Pic: Getty 
At that point, why not? It was tantamount to being up 40-Love in a fifth set. Bouchard ‚Äî who goes by ‚ÄúGenie‚Äù ‚Äî seemed confident a few minutes later. ‚Äî Genie Bouchard (@geniebouchard) February 6, 2017 
But then things started to unravel ‚Äî for the Falcons and Bouchard. ‚Äî Genie Bouchard (@geniebouchard) February 6, 2017 
And less than an hour after that, it appeared that Bouchard realized she had made a deal with the devil. (Metaphorically, folks.) Lesson learned. Never bet against Tom Brady üòá ‚Äî Genie Bouchard (@geniebouchard) February 6, 2017 
The fact that the guy has a Tiger Woods photo as his avatar ‚Ä¶ well, do with that what you please. If this thing works out, we might title this story ‚ÄúFrom Love-40 to Love‚Äù if you allow us. Close Gisele Bundchen Goes Completely NUTS Over Husband Tom Brady's Super Bowl Comeback Win UP NEXT 
To Genie‚Äôs credit, she doesn‚Äôt appear to be going back into the bottle on this one. Three wishes? This guy had one, and it came through big. Props, dude. The tennis star lost the almost unloseable bet. Pic: Getty 
Bouchard‚Äôs siblings reportedly have nicknamed her ‚ÄúThe Chosen One.‚Äù Who knew that she‚Äôd be chosen by a Twitter follower and that she‚Äôd lose what appeared to be a sure-thing bet. Great moments in Super Bowl dating history, we say. 
Eric Edholm is a writer for Shutdown Corner on Yahoo Sports. Have a tip? Email him at edholm@yahoo-inc.com or follow him on Twitter! Close Tom Brady addresses the case of his missing jersey UP NEXT
